name: jMake
short_description:
Imagin you have some folder where you developing some extension for Joomla 2.5.
After every change you need check the functionality, so you copy files to appropriate folders in Joomla installation. Some times you make changes there, and then you make reverce action, and after all you need to zip the project.
This script provide you possibility to move files of extension between development folder and Joomla installation and make zip package of the extension. You can use it also for example for make backup if you work directly inside Joomla instalation.
summary: Perl script for help in development of extension for Joomla 2.5
